original: <color=#faffa3ff>《山行》杜牧遠上寒山石徑斜，白雲生處有人家。停車坐愛楓林晚，霜葉紅於二月花。</color><color=#ff0000ff>想要執行季內政嗎？</color>
text: <color=#faffa3ff> "Mountain Walk" Du Muyuan goes up the stone path of the cold mountain, where there are people living in the white clouds. Parking and sitting in love Fenglin night, frosty leaves are red in February flowers. </color><color=#ff0000ff>Do you want to carry out the internal affairs of the quarter? </color>
